paragraph: Park So-hyun (born February 11, 1971) is a South Korean actress. She has a syndicated talk radio show Love Game, aired via the SBS Power FM since 1999. She also participated in variety show We Got Married.

On September 20, 2016, Park So-hyun and VIXX member Leo collaborated to celebrate SBS Power FM’s 20th Anniversary and released the song "That's All" (그뿐야) as part of SBS Power FM's Anniversary song project.
